actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dryad makes two Vine Whip or Blast of Pollen attacks. If both Vine Whip attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 14 STR save or be restrained by vines until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Vine Whip
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blast of Pollen
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d6+4) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Fey Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The dryad is resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The dryad has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: One with the Forest
special_abilities.desc: While in a forest, the dryad can't be surprised, and it leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
special_abilities.desc: The dryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Tree Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within its reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or larger.
